original_title: Voices of the world the extinction of language and linguistic diversity
overview: Linguists investigate why some languages become global and others disappear and how language and identity are connected. They also discuss the state and fate of Livonian, Dogon, Mlabri, Changsha Hua, Naqxi, Pitjantjatjara, Pintupi, and Tutunaku
title: Voices of the world the extinction of language and linguistic diversity
